name: Salsify UI
description: The main Salsify client application source code, serving the application found at app.salsify.com/app. This Ember.js application handles the primary user interface for Salsify's product experience management platform.

name: Dandelion
description: A GraphQL API service that the Salsify UI application communicates with. Used for schema introspection and type generation in the salsify-ui codebase.
